instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.U7100: What is U7100? U7100 refers to the ISL6259 or ISL9239 charging IC on Macbooks from 2013 to the present.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
This boards is working one except battery not detected.

 <RESISTOR>R5380</RESISTOR>: 1.9K,   
<RESISTOR>R5381</RESISTOR>: 1.9k,   
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>: 8.58V with  charger
diode mode
J6950 P4: 0.473, 
J6950 P5: 0.473 ,
J6950 P6: OL
<RESISTOR>R6950</RESISTOR>: 10 K
This is good battery works with other unit.
Any help please.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
threads.message:
Check with o-scope for pulses at SCL/SDA lines.
You can start replacing <CHIP>U7100</CHIP> first; be sure <RESISTOR>R7100</RESISTOR> is good.
The last option is SMC...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
threads.message: Found pulses at SCL/SDA lines. <RESISTOR>R7100</RESISTOR> is good.Replacing <CHIP>U7100</CHIP> . Rflow SMC but no luck. This is my second one mb but no luck. Dont know what the exactly issue.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
threads.message:
Change SMC now...

Is this liquid spill?
Be sure battery connector is clean.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a BATTERY NOT DETECTED.
threads.message:
Had the same problem, i followed this post. I changed the smc, it is working.
Thanks
